game.name: TS Marketplace: HXD3D Electric Locomotive Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Pick up the China Railways HXD3D, a six-axle AC electric locomotive produced by the Dalian Locomotive and Rolling Stock Company, and speed down the Main Line!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pick up the China Railways HXD3D, a six-axle AC electric locomotive produced by the Dalian Locomotive and Rolling Stock Company, and speed down the Main Line!
